website_summaries.verdict: A large, well-insulated bag that comes with a built-in hood so you can keep your head warm without burrowing into the bag.
pros: Hood attached to the bag to help keep your head warm
Long enough to accommodate most adults comfortably
cons: The bag is very thin, so it may be uncomfortable unless you have a sleeping bag pad

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Lightweight Sleeping Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping bag to use while sitting outside at my son's baseball and football games. I leave it zipped and pull it up around me. It works perfectly for that and is very warm and cozy. I love that it has a carry bag and it packs very easily, even for those of us that may be challenged by rolling up a sleeping bag to fit into a carry bag. It is very lightweight and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good warm!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortably warm for 50F! Although, it’s might be a bit easy to rip off from those drawstrings spot, just need some needles and threads,
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It kept me warm it was everything I needed it to be.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN Lynn

customer_reviews.title: it was just awesome. I hardly felt the cold in 52 F ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, I was surprised that it looked a little bulky. It took up almost all my space in my backpack. But you can squish it in to the bottom and place it horizontally in overnight backpacks. But when it came to functionality, it was just awesome. I hardly felt the cold in 52 F and it was very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: I like my mummy.
customer_reviews.text: Suitable for youth and adult. Light weight. Easy to fold and put it back in its case. You will need to have a pillow for it. I wished they can have more color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: sleeping bag,
customer_reviews.text: I went to munich Germany caomping it rained 4 days in a row this kept me very warm, definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: This sleeping bag by far is one the best i've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag by far is one the best i've ever bought. Besides being easy to carry, it's very warm and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm. Need to be careful with zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me warm. Need to be careful with zipper, its not heavy duty or reversible. But is expected with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gundam1s

customer_reviews.title: I used this on a camping trip in upstate New ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a camping trip in upstate New York. It was freezing at night and rained the first half of it so I was often arriving back to my tent shivering and a little damp from the grass or being caught in the storm. Within a half hour of drying off and sealing myself into this I was toasty and able to sleep. I just wish there were a pillow or the head area was as cushioned as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best freaking sleeping bags ever made. These are super comfy and warm, and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Self

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband for a "city slickers-esque" tour through the deserts of Arizona and it kept him warm and comfortable, especially in the cold desert nights.
customer_reviews.author: MMA

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheap Sleeping Bags
customer_reviews.text: These sleeping bags worked in a pinch. They are affordable, lightweight, easy to pack, and pretty comfortable. Not particularly good for anyone over average in height or weight. I will say that we were very cold on a couple of nights while using them, even though the temperature did not drop below the sleeping bags range. Next time we will plan to bring a few more layers or a blanket in case it gets chilly again. Overall, would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Nebulae

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and son for their camping trips! We tested it out in our backyard, just to make sure it fit the needs for them. They LOVED it. My son said he wished it was a little more fluffy but that’s about it. It was easy to carry, soft, and kept them warm on the earths ground all night! We can’t wait to buy more and take them with us on our next hiking adventure and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Chassidy lewis

customer_reviews.title: High quality and Lightweight, perfect camping necessity!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sleeping bag. I was surprised how warm it kept us with the lightweight feel but it didn’t lack quality in any way. It folds up nice and easy which is great! My kids were able to roll it up and put it back in the storage bag easily. I like how cozy and buttery soft the material is too. Definitely a must have for those camping and hiking trips or watching the stars in the backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag! Very light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag- very light weight. It is just one zipper.. so you can’t combine two to make it one big one. And you can’t unzip the bottom for ventilation. But I also realized I love that it’s one , so you’re not fighting and searching for the other to get it closed, and it makes it much easier. Depends more on what you’re looking for. Great option for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 seasons sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable and cozy (so far we’ve experienced it at approximately 50*F) sleeping bag! The fabric is nice and it seems to be well made, especially for the price. I like that it is the cocoon style but still wide at the feet so my legs don’t get claustrophobic. It was about the same length as our other sleeping bags, so I’d say it’s your average size. Very friendly company/customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: KourtE

customer_reviews.title: It's a good bag
customer_reviews.text: The material is this sleeping bag feels good, it's easy to sleep in and convenient to wash. This is the second sleeping bag that I've ordered. The lettering and the squirrel at the foot is the bag will start peeling after some time of washing. That didn't matter to me, I just know to expect it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Brown

customer_reviews.title: We loved it...until it ripped
customer_reviews.text: My son's new sleeping bag ripped within a month of purchasing it. It was the 3rd or 4th use. It ripped while my wife was zipping it after he had used it, the fabric ripped right off the zipper area, she did not pull hard. Maybe we got a lemon. Amazon is accepting a full return of course.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yowpa

customer_reviews.title: Great value, kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag has been the perfect addition to our busy family. It is light weight, but warm, cozy and perfect size. The zipper also completely opens to lay flat as a blanket. We used for sleepovers, beach picnics and keeping warm at baseball games. Good product with great value. I’ll be ordering another one to keep in our other car.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda D

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is just what I was looking for. It is lightweight and easy to pack and unpack. Making it useful for my kids for sleepovers or staying the night at grandmas. They love the drawstrings to pull the "hood" up and around them. Although I intend it for my young daughter's use primarily. It is something that will continue to work for her indefinitely as she grows. I tried it out myself, as did my teenage son and we all agreed that it was roomy and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rochon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: We recently took this sleeping bag on a camping trip and it was great. Very breathable yet keeps you warm during cooler nights outdoors. I love that it has the inflatable pillow built in which was really comfortable to sleep on, I’m not one for having to drag pillows camping. It’s really lightweight, my 2 year old had no trouble carrying it around to our campsite. Folds up easily with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Everson

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, Comfortable, lightweight, & warm sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is lightweight, has a compact carrying bag, and has a silky smooth feeling inside and out. I slipped into the sleeping bag thinking it would be too thin to keep me warm as it was pretty chilly out, but it was perfect! The material is so so soft that my daughter actually likes to use it as a blanket when cuddling on our couch. I appreciated the drawstring that allows you to pull the hood around your head to your desired tightness, the double zipper that is easy to use on the inside and the out, and the long length on the sleeping bag. I’m 5’6” and there was so much room to move my feet around!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Murray

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Bag Unzips into a Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight, comfortable sleeping bag for cool weather. It comes with a strap to make it easy to sling over your shoulder and is quite roomy inside. My favorite feature is how it unzips completely so I can use it like a blanket. The bag it comes in is fragile, however - I ripped the handle when pulling the sleeping bag out the second time. It's good for chilly weather and is rated for 50 F degrees. I haven't tried it at that temperature, but it is very comfortable for low 70's and 60's.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Meade

customer_reviews.title: Storage Bag Ripped
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice enough sleeping bag. However, as I was taking it out of it's storage bag for the first time I grabbed the strap on the bottom of the storage bag to help me pull the sleeping bag out. The strap ripped off. This item was ripped before I even got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very excited about our new sleeping bag. We love the shape of the bag, it makes it easier for sleeping in with the built in area for the head/pillow. This sleeping bag is light weight and soft, it will be perfect for summer camping as well as chilling spring/fall nights. It rolls up easily and goes into the bag that comes with it which makes it easy to carry as well as small so it doesn't take up very much space when packing. Great product at a great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole coffey

customer_reviews.title: Lights and warm
customer_reviews.text: The sleeping bag comes in a bag for storage and can be carried like a backpack with the straps ( kids do that around here). I like that it’s super light. Easy to sip up. Oh! And unzips all the way to be a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Olga S

customer_reviews.title: Good Summer Bag-Not for tall people
customer_reviews.text: I got this knowing the lower price might bring some quirks. But I needed a cheap sleeping bag for an upcoming backpacking trip in late June. So it should work. Pros: -Lightweight -Seems cozy -Fits my thin build Cons: -Does not fit tall people. I am 6'1 and my shoulders stick out. -Does not come with compression sack
customer_reviews.author: Irish-Ninjah

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and keeps you very warm.
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is very lightweight and surprisingly warm! I was skeptical when I saw how thin it was, but that quickly changed when I opened it up and used it. Definitely keeps you warm and easy to carry with you. Comes with a bag to carry in as well. Would definitely recommend for purchase and use for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya's Sweet Surprise

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is great! I am claustrophobic, I hate being hot and wrapped up in blankets/sleeping bag if they are thick and too warm. This is lightweight and so comfortable. It doesn’t make me feel like I am trapped and can’t breathe. I am also 5’10’’ and I fit in it with still a little bit of room.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this lightweight sleeping bag. It is comfy and not itchy. I love that the bag has a handle on the bottom so you can easily remove the sleeping bag. It is perfect for fall and spring camping. The cost is so affordable as well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my oldest to use and he loves it!! We haven’t used it outside yet but he’s dragged it everywhere in the house and it’s held up to two young and distructive kids!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Creo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this sleeping bag for camping this fall, have not tested it in cold weather but for the fall lows in the 40’s it has served us well! It’s light and easy to roll up!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Brehm

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is very lightweight and comfortable. It comes in a handy case and is easy to clean. My 9 year old son really enjoys using it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: great sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sleeping bag! We first used it for a weekend in glacier national park and it was awesome! So light to carry, comfortable and warm to sleep in but not too sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Randi J. Rooks

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I took this for camping at 60-70 degrees and it was great. Very comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmarie

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is a must have! It’s great for all occasions; camping, sporting events, car rides and sleep overs! The fabric is water resistant, which is a must have for us. We also love that it surrounds your head, but also still gives you plenty of foot room! The quality is great and you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Longton

customer_reviews.title: A New Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is incredible. Lightweight, folds up small, and extremely comfortable. My kids used in on our most recent camping trip in the mountains of CO and stayed very warmn!
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sleeping bag! Very well made and it will be perfect for sleepovers and camping whenever we can go again. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sleeping bag. It’s not bulky, and it’s easy to pack up. We’ll be using this for all our trips! Great quality product and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbuny631

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. It’s extremely lightweight. I’ve been leaving it in the car in case we need something while we’re out. Useful for quick hikes with the kids when they might want a blanket when we stop for a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Thrower

customer_reviews.title: Cheap stitching poor zipper
customer_reviews.text: Stitching very cheap ripped 2nd night, zipper kept catching, something you really dont want to be struggling with at 4am in a tent in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: OlGimpLeg

customer_reviews.title: he was very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for the first time on his Scout campout in about 40 degree weather; he was very comfortable and warm, falling asleep within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and compact for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag camping, is lightweight and can resave easily, is ideal for carrying in a backpack, is not highly recommended for very cold weather, I have used in my travels and would return buy, has very good price for quality, arrived very quickly, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR MAURICIO ORTIZ

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but warm!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a lightweight sleeping bag for camping. I love how compact this one is, but it is still warm and comfortable! Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Castillo Teaches

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So small and light! Perfect for on the go. I’m wanting one for each kid now!!!
customer_reviews.author: quiver.full.of.arrows

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loved it and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, lightweight sleeping bag. Perfect for summer camping.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag, super easy to pack up. It’s comfy and lightweight. Love how you can just stuff it back in the bag when you’re done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s warm, perfect for travel, and our 3 year old loves toting it around as his own. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jack’s Mom in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cozy. Packs up well. Only problems I had with this product is that the zipper occasionally got stuck and I couldn't find a practical way to transport this along with my other gear.
customer_reviews.author: La Magneta

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad sleeping bag. Its lite weigh,t rolls down small. The down side of it is it snags and gets frayed edges easily. Which makes me think the useful life of it isn't going to be long. Used for a week on the Appalachian trail.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag at a very nice price
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag at a very nice price. Good and warm, but still packs down really small to stuff into my son's backpack for Scouting trips. The top of the bag does a very nice job of keeping his pillow in place throughout the night. No more hunting around for a pillow that slipped away. Good zippers and solid construction. No complaints. For colder camping, below 30 degrees, he uses this bag, plus a zippered fleece sleeping bag liner. (Not associated with this product, just do a search for it here on Amazon.) Overall, just as happy with this $27 bag as I would be with a $100 bag.
customer_reviews.author: Goodeknight

customer_reviews.title: Compact while still good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact this sleeping bag was! It is perfect for travel! My youngest child doesn’t like sleeping bags but it unzips to a perfect quilt for him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for travelling in cold weather in the car. ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for travelling in cold weather in the car. Not as thick or warm as I thought it would be. OK for maybe 60 degree nights but not much lower temps.
customer_reviews.author: JB FL

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson for summer camp. It's light-weight with its on carrying bag. It was no trouble for him to keep up with. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Like you feel mummified
customer_reviews.text: It's kinda tight in this sleeping bag. Like you feel mummified. But it was okay for a two day camp out in the summer. Not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Smarti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sleeping bag for price rolls up easy in stuff sack
customer_reviews.author: Troy Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry.  Nice to sleep in.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect sleeping bag for camping in Arizona. It is lightweight while we are hiking to our spot and it isn’t too heavy to sleep in. I like it so much that I am going to order it for everyone in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: very warm and comfortable on cooler camping nights
customer_reviews.text: bag works as expected. very warm and comfortable on cooler camping nights. on complaint is that it could be a bit wider.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: It packs easily into its stuffsack
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bag for Boy Scouts. It packs easily into its stuffsack, and is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck V

customer_reviews.title: easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to pack, easy to carry and all at a great cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Easy to re-pack, light and warm enough
customer_reviews.text: Easy to re-pack inside the pouch, very light and warm enough, recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt do well with temps of 48 at all. ...
customer_reviews.text: Didnt do well with temps of 48 at all. plus the fact that my entire shoulders were sticking out was quite a problem. decent if just for a sleepover or something, but not for anything serious. do not buy if youre over 5'9".
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: but a great size that my son will grow with for his ...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as described, very lightweight & compact, but a great size that my son will grow with for his Boy Scout years.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but it started to rip after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Z.M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable & very Warm, easy to roll up & pack in the bag it came with
customer_reviews.author: Andrew ferran

customer_reviews.title: great sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: The packing was larger than I expected to lug around camping so I had to return. Otherwise, great sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great find. I purchased this for my daughter who ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find. I purchased this for my daughter who was going to a school outdoor funtion. At first i was worried if it would keep her warm but when she returned she said she was cozy. Glad i purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ababseh

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than compact sleeping bags
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected, so I returned it. It seems nice quality but can't pack it for travel abroad. Bought one with compression straps instead.
customer_reviews.author: Patty29

customer_reviews.title: ... in on time as mentioned and sleeping bag fits perfect but the material was a bit too weak
customer_reviews.text: It came in on time as mentioned and sleeping bag fits perfect but the material was a bit too weak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple review 101
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. The product very easy I mean easy to tear if not careful. Other than it do it job.
customer_reviews.author: dewhitt

customer_reviews.title: It works but was too short for my 6'4 body ...
customer_reviews.text: It works but was too short for my 6'4 body but I stayed warm I just didn't get one long enough for my body.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not as small as we might have liked, but still easy to transport and not heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for what we wanted. Not as small as we might have liked, but still easy to transport and not heavy at all. Kept us very warm in 50 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: HVK77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for a great quality sleeping bag and super fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: Maile L. Crews

customer_reviews.title: Good little summer bag if your not on the ground
customer_reviews.text: Son loved it at camp. It's a summer sleeping bag. We are in the south, so it works great for him. However, for sending smallish ones off to camp... It doesn't want to go back into that bag it comes in. As a mom and longtime GS and camper- I aired that baby out and got some bungee (2 Bc boys play with those things and will lose one and he did :) ). cords to wrap around it and hook to his bag.
customer_reviews.author: I Said It

customer_reviews.title: falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last a year. The stitching just falls out of it and it comes apart. Not good quality at all. Save yourself the disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag, bag stuff sack
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping bag is comfy and warm however stuff sack is cheap and tore the first time I removed the sleeping bag. Good bag but I would get a better stuff sack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good sleeping bag for moderate temps
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, warm and just wide enough, but I'm pretty wide. Liked the mummy feature although at only 5'9" it didn't have a lot of room to spare. Easy to zip and unzip from inside. Would appreciate if the carrying bag was just a little bigger. Sometimes felt like I might need a crow bar to get in all in. Definitely recommend a sllep pad underneath to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sleeping bag for average sleeping nights
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sleeping bag for average sleeping nights. The sleeping bag is comfortable, spacious, and rolls up nicely. I slept for a week in 60 degree weather and was never too hot or too cold. As long as you're a casual camper this is a perfect sleeping bag (I am 6'1 180lbs and It fit me perfectly)
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bag was cozy, I had plenty of legroom and I'm 6-3. I was able to roll it back up and get it into the pouch without issue. The zipper and pouch both seemed a bit flimsy, but otherwise I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it takes up a good amount of space in my pack
customer_reviews.text: Work well and def kept me warm during the windy nights at the beach, but it takes up a good amount of space in my pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Juan

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight bag
customer_reviews.text: Great for backpacking or when space is limited. Not an Arctic bag by any means but rolls up small & is suprisingly warm.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to carry, but it's not very comfortable for outdoor camping - you definitely need padding between you and the rocky ground. It's hard to re-fold to get back in the tiny carrying case
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed as this was why I purchased these
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere that these were able to be zipped together. They do not! I was very disappointed as this was why I purchased these. They were a decent lightweight, comfortable, inexpensive, bag otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great- have not used it yet- lets see how warm this is..
customer_reviews.author: marisol Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great summer bag but NOT for early spring or late ...
customer_reviews.text: 30 degrees? Maybe if you're inside. Great summer bag but NOT for early spring or late fall in Maryland. It was 40 degrees when I used it, I was sleeping in my truck, and I was still cold after putting blankets over me. Good thing I wasn't in a tent.
customer_reviews.author: ACW

customer_reviews.title: FOR SLEEPING INSIDE ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Don't take this bag backpacking.. It's not warm and all of your heat goes through the bottom
customer_reviews.author: nicholas akins

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The material feels very synthetic and is not breathable at all. Not ideal for a summer camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: April flavell

customer_reviews.title: This sleeping bag is not good for hiking like the description says
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is not good for hiking like the description says. It is HUGE. Way to big to go hiking with.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: COLD!!!
customer_reviews.text: SO COLD!!!!!!!, I wish buyers will be more honest., it would avoid me the trouble., it's a nice sleeping bag but that's about it., it's not warm at all., I will return once the holidays are over.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Received this and it appears nice and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Received this and it appears nice and cozy. My issue is once you remove it from the bag it is impossible to put it back in the bag. For that reason alone I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa DiCesare

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived on time and is perfect! Cool sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.author: BRADLEY CARTER

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but does not insulate well
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but does not insulate well. Would wear insulation clothes or a blanket when sleeping in 60 degree F weather
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: egoz Peanut Sleeping Bag Envelope Lightweight Portable Warm Adult - Great for 3 Season Traveling Camping Hiking & Outdoor Activities - Cool Weather Sleeping Bag with Easy to Carry Bag
product_meta.description:
Description

Stay warm and comfortable on your next adventure with the Egoz Peanut Sleeping Bag. It is an excellent choice for staying protected on those cool and warm weather, for hiking and camping trips or emergency situations.The bag is lined with Cotton that treated with molecular level polyester to create a hydrophobic insulation to ensure it can handle a temperature of 40 degrees Fahrenheit . Egoz sleeping bags easily rolls and stuffs into the included stuff sack. It is equipped with a polyester cover to ensure that the insulation doesn't shift during use. Add this Egoz sleeping bag to your camping gear or survival kit so you can stay warm in a cool or warm Weather. It is extremely durable and designed to withstand during outdoor use. The sleeping bag also makes an excellent gift for those outdoor enthusiasts in your life and perfect for indoor use. The sleeping bag is designed Rectangular style with drawstring hood and draft collar to provide critical warmth and for the head, neck, and shoulders protection for the head, neck, and shoulders.

Temperature range: Comfort +50°F / +10°C, Limit +40°F / +4°C, Extreme +30°F / -1°C.
Stuff sack Size: 9” x 15” (22 cm x 38 cm).
Total Weight: 3 lbs (1400g).
Internal Length: 83" (211 cm).
Maximum User Height: 6'6" (198 cm).
Size: 211x75cm, Folded: 36x22x22cm.

Benefits

3 seasons sleeping bag for cool/warm weather.
Lightweight and high quality material: the sleeping bag filled with 300 GSM, the exterior made from 190T polyester for comfort, extra warmth and protection.
Ultra comfort: the bag has envelope shaped design which is wide at the shoulders and at the legs to offer maximum comfort.
Extra protection: rectangular style with drawstring hood and draft collar to provide warmth and protection for the head, neck and shoulders.
Easy to clean and comes with a travel – friendly and easy to carry bag.
Best value for the price.
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY DESIGN - Egoz sleeping bag shell is durable, easy to pack, and stands up to years of use; designed to keep you warm and comfortable.

ULTRA COMFORTABLE SLEEPING BAG - Egoz sleeping bags are designed to ensure that after a day of trekking, hiking, Survival, camping travel or any other exploration you can get a good and relaxing night's sleep. The bags have Envelope shaped design which is wide at the shoulders and leg's end to offer maximum comfort, warmth and freedom.

LIGHTWEIGHT QUALITY MATERIAL - 300 GSM ultra-warm filling makes it perfect for 3 seasons. Exterior is made from 190T polyester for comfort and protection. Size: 210x75cm, folded: 36x22x22cm. Weight Only 1.4KG/ 3lbs. 3 Season Sleeping Bag, Temp. rated - Comfort +50°F / +10°C, Limit +40°F / +4°C, Extreme +30°F / -1°C.

EASY TO CLEAN AND CARRY - Our sleeping bags are also extremely easy to clean. Moreover, each sleeping bag comes with a compression travel-friendly carry bag, which makes it quite convenient to store and carry the sleeping bag along.

EXTRA PROTECTION - The 'Peanut' sleeping bag is designed Rectangular style with drawstring hood and draft collar to provide critical warmth and protection for the head, neck, and shoulders. No need to sacrifice weight for practical comfort.
